ing: salt and white pepper to taste
des: "This is a traditional tartar sauce complete with hardboiled egg and capers.  Can be stored in the refrigerator for up to 3 days."
ins: In a small bowl, mix together mayonnaise, sweet pickle relish, capers, and egg.  Season to taste with salt and white pepper.  Add a dash of Worcestershire sauce and a dash hot pepper sauce.  Stir.  Chill.
